resources.string: Creamy scrambled eggs on toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, lime juice, and cilantro.
Greek Yogurt with Granola and Berries
Layers of Greek yogurt, granola, fresh berries, and a drizzle of honey.
Blend yogurt, fruit, milk, and spinach for a nutritious and refreshing start
Whip up fluffy pancakes with mashed banana, milk, and egg. Top with maple syrup and nuts.
Scramble eggs with salsa and cheese, wrap in a tortilla with avocado and black beans.
Mix canned tuna with mayo, celery, onion, and spices for a classic sandwich on whole-wheat bread.
Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
A hearty and healthy soup with lentils, vegetables, and spices. Serve with crusty bread.
Vegetarian burgers made with black beans, corn, and spices. Serve on buns with your favorite toppings.
Light pasta dish with fresh vegetables, garlic, olive oil, and herbs.
Sliced chicken, peppers, and onions cooked together in a skillet with fajita seasoning. Serve on tortillas with salsa and guacamole.
Baked salmon with colorful roasted vegetables like broccoli, carrots, and potatoes.
Sauteed shrimp in a garlicky white wine sauce served over pasta.
Chicken breasts baked with lemon, herbs, and garlic, served with roasted asparagus.
Easy and satisfying quesadillas filled with black beans, corn, cheese, and salsa.
Hummus with Pita Bread and Vegetables
Healthy dip made with chickpeas, tahini, and olive oil. Enjoy with pita bread, carrots, and cucumbers.
Fresh avocado mashed with lime juice, cilantro, and salt. Serve with tortilla chips for dipping.
Fruit Salad with Honey Yogurt Dressing
A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits with a simple honey yogurt dressing.
Crunchy and flavorful chickpeas roasted with spices. Perfect for snacking or salads.
Steamed or boiled soybeans in their pods. Sprinkle with salt for a healthy and satisfying snack.
Single-serving cake made in a mug with flour, sugar, cocoa powder, milk, and egg. Microwave for a quick and delicious treat.
Top sliced apples, pears, or berries with a crumble topping and bake until golden. Serve with vanilla ice cream.
Rich and creamy mousse made with avocado, cocoa powder, honey, and milk.
Blend yogurt, fruit, and honey for healthy and refreshing popsicles.
Baked apples filled with oats, nuts, and cinnamon. A warm and comforting dessert.
Top mini bagels with tomato sauce, cheese, and your favorite toppings. Bake until golden and bubbly.
A versatile dish with endless possibilities. Choose your protein, vegetables, and sauce for a quick and customizable meal.
Combine a homemade soup like tomato or lentil with a grilled cheese or tuna salad sandwich for a satisfying and classic lunch.
Get creative with leftovers! Turn leftover chicken into a stir-fry, pasta salad, or tacos. Leftover vegetables can be roasted, added to soups, or used in frittatas.
Toss together protein, vegetables, and seasonings.
